title: United States Office Investment Review
name: ./office-investment.pdf
description: This presentation is an overview of investment trends in the United States Office market, covering all transactions greater than $5 million in the top 50 markets across the country. It sources JLL’s in house data, as well as third-party data sources including the Federal Reserve, Real Capital Analytics and the National Council of Real Estate Investment Fiduciaries. It was delivered to JLL’s leadership and key clients.

title: Money Doesn't Grow on Trees: It Comes From Venture Capital Firms
name: ./2015-VC-infographic.pdf
description: This infographic details the relationship between venture capital funding and real estate markets. It sources JLL’s in house data, as well as third-party data sources including Yahoo Finance. It was delivered to JLL’s Tenant Representation group to aid decision making on location and footprint for technology clients.
